sentences.en: An importer can endorse the BL and sell the goods even before they arrive.
sentences.cn: 进口商可以在提货单背面签字,在货物到岸之前就可以把货物卖出去.

sentences.en: Endorse the overture by director XXX from provincial TB Institute.
sentences.cn: (讲好省的例子)赞成xxx所长提案.

sentences.en: I can endorse their opinion wholeheartedly.
sentences.cn: 我可以全力赞同他们的意见。

sentences.en: I fully endorse what Mr. Johnson has said about school management.
sentences.cn: 我同意约翰逊先生关于学校管理的意见.

sentences.en: I fully endorse your opinions on this subject.
sentences.cn: 我完全拥护你对此课题的主张.

sentences.en: I would like to endorse any choice you make.
sentences.cn: 我愿意认可你做出的任何选择.

sentences.en: In 1925 he'encouraged'his admirals to endorse a decision not to build any carriers.
sentences.cn: 一九二五年,他竟然 “ 鼓励”海军将领们作出了一项不建造任何航空母舰的决定.

sentences.en: It voted 7 - 2 to endorse its use alongside metformin, another treatment.
sentences.cn: 7-2 的表决结果赞成它与metformin并同使用于另一种治疗.

sentences.en: No. Please endorse the check at the back.
sentences.cn: 不会的,请在支票背面签名.

sentences.en: The payee of the cheque must endorse the cheque.
sentences.cn: 领款人必须在支票上背书。

sentences.en: The rock star agreed to endorse their product on TV.
sentences.cn: 那个摇滚明星同意在电视上宣传他们的产品.

sentences.en: This is an attitude which I endorse.
sentences.cn: 这也是我所珍视的态度.

sentences.en: We clearly endorse different ideologies and it would be idle to pretend otherwise.
sentences.cn: 显然我们双方在意识形态上是互不相同的,对此无庸加以掩饰.

sentences.en: Will you please endorse the check on and show me your passport?
sentences.cn: 请您在支票背面署上您的名字,同时让我看一下您的护照.

words.tran_cn: 认可，支持；背书；签注（文件）
支持，赞同（endorse的过去式）；批注（文件，公文等）

trans.tran_cn: 赞同，支持，宣传，（在支票背面）签名，（在驾照上）注明违章
trans.tran_en: to express formal support or approval for someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 背书； 赞同； 认可
trans.tran_en: to express formal support or approval for someone or something
